notes: FIX: Resolved a TypeError on application load by adding a defensive null check in `vehicle.js`, improving script stability.
FEATURE: Implemented real-time filtering for vehicle Year, Make, and Model dropdowns to improve search usability.
FIX: The '+ Add Race' link in the header now correctly navigates to the Race Schedule view.
FIX: Corrected a missing utility function that prevented vehicle search filters from working.
FIX: Resolved critical JavaScript TypeError that prevented event listeners from initializing correctly.
FIX: Restored functionality to the 'Winner's Circle' and 'Upcoming Features' cards.
FEATURE: Added a 'Manage Garages' button to the Vehicle Management screen for more intuitive access.
Fixed a critical defect caused by a typo in an HTML element ID that prevented the application from loading correctly.
Added a new 'Winner's Circle' feature to record and display lap times for raceday events.
Redesigned the SVG helmet icon to include a visor for a more distinct and polished look.
Replaced all 'Edit' and 'Delete' text buttons with icons for a cleaner and more consistent user interface across the application.
